## A conversation between R and Python
```{R}
library(reticulate)

hey <- "What's up"
```

```{python}
hi ="Not much what about you"
print(r.hey,hi)


```
```{R}
Wrong <- "Nothing just sold all my Doge Coin"


```

```{python}
Correct = "What have you done"

```

```{R}
cat(c(Wrong,py$Correct))

```
